Island Hopping in Thailand

R520 ($29)

We are giving one of you a very special gift - a spot on our luxurious 12-day Island Hopping Group Trip for only $29!

Is Thailand on your bucket list? Is it a dream of yours to walk along white sandy beaches on a tropical island? If this is your dream, then this gift is going to make you SCREAM! Because we are giving you the chance to join our group trip where we go to multiple tropical islands in Thailand!

Click the floating gold button to enter this giveaway.

This trip is valued at $2990. Now is your chance to possibly get it for $29!

You can enter as many times as you like! Click the floating gold button now!

Entries close in the morning on 4 November 2024

and the winner will be announced in the evening on 4 November 2024!

Is this trip for you?

  • You love relaxing on the beach.
  • You've traveled solo or as a pair before, but want to travel with friends.
  • Exploring vibrant coral reefs are a must-do for you.
  • You want a luxury holiday, but have a "backpacker budget".
  • You want to travel more, but don't enjoy the planning.
  • Island hopping is a dream come true!
  • You want to go to Asia, but you're actually a little nervous to go alone.
  • You like doing group trips, but not with 50 randoms and a tour guide shouting instructions.
  • You've always wanted to visit Thailand.
  • You're interested in other cultures.
  • You would like to visit unique temples
  • You like adventure and don't mind walking if it's to see something cool!

If you answered “yes” to any of these statements, this trip is for you.

What's included?

Transport and accommodation

All transport and accommodation from the moment you arrive to the moment you leave

  • Luxury accommodation
  • Breakfast
  • Airport pick up and drop off
  • Shuttle van to and from attractions
  • All ferries and boat trips
  • All park entry fees
  • *Flights to and from Thailand are not included

Island hopping

  • 12 days in Thailand
  • Explore over 10 different islands
  • Trip to Ao Sane Beach, Railay Beach and Freedom Beach Two nights on Koh Phi Phi Don island
  • One night in Railay surrounded by limestone mountains
  • Longtail boat trip to Phi Phi Le, Maya Bay, Monkey Beach and Viking cave
  • Snorkeling Trips
  • Longtail boat trip to Hong Island, Pakbia Island and Lading Island
  • James Bond Island and Koh Panyee

Cultural attractions and national parks

  • Visit FIVE different national parks Dragon Crest Mountain
  • Emerald Pool, Khlong Thom Neua
  • Krabi Natural Thermal Baths and Hot Springs
  • Koh Panyee Muslim Fishing Village
  • Tiger Cave Temple, Wat Suwan Khuka, Wat Kaew Manee Si Mahathat
  • Monkey Hill
  • Phuket Big Buddha
  • Phuket Old Town
  • Sunday Market Walking Street

Outline of Itinerary

Phuket
3 days

  • Jungle hike to Freedom Beach
  • Big Buddha sightseeing
  • Experience the monkeys on Monkey Hill
  • More beaches
  • Party on the notorious Bangla Road
  • Shop, eat and enjoy the atmosphere of the Sunday Old Town Market

    • Phi Phi
    2 days

    • Relax by the pool
    • Enjoy the nearby beaches
    • Hike to the viewpoints
    • Dinner on the beach
    • Half Day Boat Trip around the island
    • Visit 4 - 5 different spots, snorkel and sightsee
    • Relax. Enjoy the nearby beach. Walk through the town
    • Fireshow on the beach

    Ao Nang
    4 days

    • Sunset Hike
    • Dinner on the beach
    • Fireshow on the beach
    • Half Day Boat Trip
    • Visit Hong Island and other surrounding islands
    • Hike to Tiger Cave Temple
    • Spend the afternoon at Emerald Pools

    Phang Nga
    1 day

    • Experience a local homestay
    • Eat dinner with a local family
    • Visit Wat Kaew Manee Si Mahathat
    • Watch the sunset at Samet Viewpoint
    • Half Day Boat Trip
    • Visit James Bond Island and Fisherman Village

    Phuket
    1 day

    • Drive back to Phuket
    • Enjoy our last dinner together

    Optional Activities

    • Kayaking
    • Rock climbing
    • Massages
    • Parasailing
    • Monkey feeding

    FAQs

    What is the date of the trip?

    The trip starts on 11 April 2025 and ends on 22 April 2025.

    What if I can't make those dates?

    No problem at all! You will be able to join the next trip! In fact, you will be able to join any of our upcoming trips. Which ever ones suit you best. However, dates for upcoming trips have not yet been confirmed.

    Can I enter more than once?

    Yes! Of course. You can enter as many times as you like. Each entry costs $29. You can add as many as you like when checking out. Click the golden "Enter Now!" button then click the plus (+) sign. This will add more entries to your cart. The more you enter, the higher your chances are at receiving this exclusive gift from us!

    Is my spot on the trip transferable?

    Yes! Absolutely! If you would like to give your luxury holiday to a loved one, no problem. However, we will hop on a call with them first to make sure they are suitable for this luxurious group trip to Thailand.

    If I don't win, can I still join the trip?

    Yes! And we have a very special surprise! If you don't win, but still join the trip, the cost of your entry will come off the early bird price ($2570). So, you will receive a $29 discount on top of the early bird price ($2541). In other words, you don't pay a cent for entering this giveaway if you join the trip!

    Is my entry refundable?

    We're so excited you want to join us! Just a quick note: all entries are final and non-refundable. However, if you decide to join the trip, the cost of your entry will come off the early bird price ($2570). So, you will receive a $29 discount on top of the early bird price ($2541). In other words, you don't pay a cent for entering this giveaway if you join the trip!

    Can I bring a partner / a friend?

    Yes! And we are so excited that you would like to do this. However, your plus one will just need to pay the early bird price of $2570.

    I have another question...

    Send us your questions here and ask away!
